snippet: Christine Ebersole makes light of her own deep foreboding in her show “The End of the World as We Know It Cabaret” at Café Carlyle.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews cabaret show by Christine Ebersole at Cafe Carlyle.
lead_paragraph: Christine Ebersole makes light of her own deep foreboding in her show “The End of the World as We Know It Cabaret” at Café Carlyle.

headline.seo: Christine Ebersole Performs at Café Carlyle
headline.main: Even in the Worst of Times, a Song Can Help You Through
headline.print_headline: Even in the Worst of Times, A Song Can Help You Through
